data.title: Suspiria
data.text:
Tagline: In Dario Argento’s Giallo masterpiece SUSPIRIA, an American dancer in Germany finds herself in the clutches of the powerful coven of witches that reign over a dance academy.

Critic Quotes: “What lingers is not a sense of evil but exhilaration in how far Argento and his fellow filmmakers were willing to go to shock and delight; the movie’s sheer exuberance is the cinematic equivalent of a blood transfusion.” – The Ringer

“It’s always fascinating to watch; the thrills and spills are so classy and fast that the movie becomes in effect what horror movies seemed like when you were too young to get in to see them.” – Time Out

“There are horror films that scare and there are horror films that quake the senses; Suspiria still rattles twenty-five years after its original release.” – Slant Magazine

Showtimes:

Saturday October 1, 2022: 9:00

Ticket Prices: $10 Regular Admission / $7 Members
